mapper.insert: insert into member( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PASSWORD , USER_NAME , USER_ADDRESS , USER_POSTCODE , USER_PHONE , USER_EMAIL , USER_BIRTH , USER_GENDER , USER_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( USER_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{USER_ID} , #{USER_PASSWORD},#{USER_NAME},#{USER_ADDRESS}, #{USER_POSTCODE},#{USER_PHONE},#{USER_EMAIL},#{USER_BIRTH} , #{USER_GENDER} , SYSDATE )
